title: "r-matrices"
format: html

```{r}
my_values <- seq(from = 1, to = 10, by = 1)

my_values
```

```{r}
my_matrix <- matrix(data = my_values, nrow = 2, ncol = 5, byrow = TRUE)

my_matrix
```

```{r}
my_values2 <- seq(from = 1, to = 15, by = 1)

my_values2

```
```{r}
my_matrix2 <- matrix(my_values2, nrow = 3, ncol = 5, byrow = TRUE)

my_matrix2
```

```{r}
4 * my_matrix
```
